item.title: Word Lens assists travelers in translating signs instantly
item.description:
Quest Visual, the company behind the augmented reality app Word Lens, has decided to offer the app and all of its language packs for free for a limited time. This includes languages like English, French, Italian, Portuguese, and Russian. This gesture of thanks to their users comes as the company transitions to new ownership under Google. Source: Word Lens page on Play Store. You can download the Glass, Android, and iOS versions of Word Lens from the Quest Visual website...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/word-lens-assists-travelers-in-translating-signs-instantly/

item.title: The Free Learner's Dictionary provides limitless translations
item.description:
Dictionary.com’s Android app, with over 80 million downloads, now features a free Learner’s Dictionary. This addition provides users with comprehensive tools for professional success, from job searching to business meetings. English, as the dominant language in the business world, is used by approximately 565 million people online. According to a 2012 Harvard Business Review report, a growing number of companies, including major corporations like Airbus and Samsung, have adopted English as their official language...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-free-learner-s-dictionary-provides-limitless-translations/
